player.name: Adventurer
player.description: A brave adventurer delving into the depths of an ancient dungeon
player.entityPrompt: You are a seasoned adventurer exploring a dangerous dungeon filled with monsters, traps, and treasure. You're skilled in combat, trap detection, and dungeon navigation. You carry a torch, weapons, and basic supplies. Focus on how your actions affect your health, equipment condition, and progress through the dungeon's challenges.

entities.name: Dungeon Entrance
entities.description: A crumbling stone archway marks the entrance to the ancient dungeon. Moss and vines cover the weathered walls, and the air grows noticeably colder as it flows from the darkness within. Old bones and rusted weapons litter the ground near the entrance, grim warnings from previous adventurers. Your torch flickers in the draft. A heavy wooden door leads deeper into the dungeon.

entities.name: Weathered Warning Sign
entities.description: A wooden sign hangs crookedly from a rusted chain. Faded letters warn: 'Turn back, ye who value life. Only death awaits below.'

entities.name: Skeletal Remains
entities.description: The scattered bones of previous adventurers lie among broken weapons and torn leather armor. Something killed them before they even entered the dungeon proper.

entities.name: Heavy Wooden Door
entities.description: A reinforced wooden door bound with iron bands. It stands slightly ajar, darkness beyond.

entities.name: Hall of Torches
entities.description: A long stone corridor stretches ahead, lined with ancient torch sconces. Some still hold the charred remains of torches from long ago. The walls are carved with faded murals depicting battles between heroes and monsters. The floor is covered in dust and debris. A door to the south leads back to the entrance, while a passage continues north into darkness. An iron gate blocks the way east.

entities.name: Iron Torch Sconces
entities.description: Rusted iron brackets line the walls, designed to hold torches. Most are empty, but a few still contain ancient, unlit torches.

entities.name: Carved Murals
entities.description: Faded carvings depict armored warriors fighting dragons, demons, and undead creatures. One section shows a great treasure vault guarded by a fearsome beast.

entities.name: Door to Entrance
entities.description: The heavy wooden door leads back to the dungeon entrance.

entities.name: Dark Passage
entities.description: A narrow passage continues north into complete darkness.

entities.name: Iron Gate
entities.description: A heavy iron gate blocks the eastern passage. It appears to be locked, but the mechanism looks old and possibly breakable.

entities.name: Ancient Guard Room
entities.description: This chamber once served as a guard post. Stone benches line the walls, and weapon racks stand empty. A large table in the center is covered in dust and cobwebs. Strange scratching sounds echo from the shadows. The passage south leads back to the torch hall, while stairs descend deeper into the dungeon to the north.

entities.name: Empty Weapon Racks
entities.description: Wooden racks that once held spears, swords, and shields. Most are empty, but a few rusted weapons remain.

entities.name: Dusty Table
entities.description: A heavy wooden table covered in thick dust. Old dice, playing cards, and empty bottles suggest guards once passed time here. A leather-bound logbook lies open.

entities.name: Passage to Hall
entities.description: The passage leads back south to the hall of torches.

entities.name: Stone Stairs Down
entities.description: Worn stone steps descend into deeper darkness. Cold air rises from below, carrying a faint smell of decay.

entities.name: Treasure Vault
entities.description: Beyond the iron gate lies a small vault. Gold coins are scattered across the floor, and a wooden chest sits against the far wall. The room glitters in your torchlight, but something feels wrong. The air is unnaturally still. The iron gate leads back west to the hall.

entities.name: Scattered Gold
entities.description: Gold coins lie scattered across the floor, as if someone dropped them in haste. They gleam temptingly in the torchlight.

entities.name: Ornate Chest
entities.description: A wooden chest bound with brass fittings sits against the wall. It's unlocked but appears undisturbed. Too easy?

entities.name: Iron Gate
entities.description: The iron gate leads back west to the hall of torches.

entities.name: Burial Crypt
entities.description: The stairs open into a large crypt filled with stone sarcophagi. Carved effigies of ancient warriors lie atop each tomb, their stone faces stern and watchful. The air is thick with the smell of death and ancient dust. Shadows dance in your torchlight, and you swear you hear whispers. Stone stairs lead back up, and a dark archway leads deeper into the crypt to the east.

entities.name: Ancient Tombs
entities.description: Stone sarcophagi line the walls, each sealed with heavy lids. Ancient runes warn against disturbing the dead.

entities.name: Warrior Effigies
entities.description: Carved stone warriors lie atop the tombs, clutching stone swords and shields. Their eyes seem to follow you in the flickering torchlight.

entities.name: Stairs Up
entities.description: Stone stairs lead back up to the guard room.

entities.name: Dark Archway
entities.description: A carved archway leads deeper into the crypt. Strange symbols glow faintly around its edges.

entities.name: Chamber of the Guardian
entities.description: A vast circular chamber with a domed ceiling. Ancient pillars support the roof, and a raised dais dominates the center of the room. Upon the dais sits a massive stone throne, and upon that throne... something stirs in the darkness. Piles of treasure surround the throne: gold, gems, weapons, and armor. The archway west leads back to the crypt.

entities.name: Ancient Throne
entities.description: A massive throne carved from black stone sits atop the dais. It radiates an aura of power and menace. Something ancient and powerful has claimed this seat.

entities.name: Guardian's Hoard
entities.description: Mountains of gold coins, precious gems, enchanted weapons, and magical artifacts surround the throne. This is the accumulated wealth of centuries, guarded by whatever lurks in this chamber.

entities.name: Archway to Crypt
entities.description: The carved archway leads back west to the burial crypt.
